response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $800,000 to you, based on your needs and desires. We are offering it to you today at a special price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price that is more than fair, considering its worth and the benefits it offers. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find this product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.", "product_price": 750000}
